name: Cucumber Party Sandwiches
author: Esther
summary: My girls and I like to have these for our tea parties. I've also served these for a bridal shower. They are a dainty and wonderful treat for any special occasion!
directions: Place cucumber into a strainer and sprinkle with kosher salt; allow cucumber to drain for about 20 minutes
Transfer cucumber to a piece of cheesecloth and squeeze dry
Mash cream cheese with seasoned salt and cumin in a bowl
Stir cucumber into cream cheese mixture
Spread the cucumber mixture on a slice of bread; top with a second slice
Press the slices together lightly and trim off the crusts
Slice each sandwich into 4 triangles by cutting an X shape
